column2: in  conformity  with  such  amount  as  stated
decision.  It is  to  be  observed  that  these  sections  do  not  provide  for  the

column1: conduct  of  re-inquiries  as  has  been  provided

column2: appeal  proceedings.  This  could  be  to avoid  any  conflict  with  the  operation
